definition: to transmit/to lead/to guide/to conduct/to direct

sentences.english: For example: R1 service door upper guide and door latch on doorframe is worn.
sentences.chinese: R1服務門上導軌和門框的門閂陳舊並且磨損。

sentences.english: The technology of circumferentially grinding the guideways of machine tools is an economical and practical way.
sentences.chinese: 周邊磨削機牀導軌工藝是一條經濟實用的途徑。

sentences.english: Drill holes on the top of the doorway according to the hole position on the guiding track. Fill in plastic plug when necessary.
sentences.chinese: 根據導軌孔位在門洞上端鑽孔，必要時打入膠塞。

sentences.english: A ratchet slider is movably mounted to the horizontal guide frame.
sentences.chinese: 棘齒滑塊被可移動地安裝於所述水平導軌框架。

sentences.english: The development of HG hydraulic slide way oil was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹HG液壓導軌油的研製過程。

sentences.english: The guide rail of working table has large span and strong anti-overturn capacity.
sentences.chinese: 工作臺導軌跨距大，抗顛覆能力強。

sentences.english: Up to seven of these modular units plug into a bookshelf-style card rack.
sentences.chinese: 每個機架式插件板導軌最多可安裝7個此模塊裝置。

sentences.english: Imported ball bearing leas screw and linear guide rail have ensured a repeated positioning precision of the machine tool.
sentences.chinese: 進口滾珠絲槓及直線導軌確保了機牀的重複定位精度。

sentences.english: The electric current supplied to the coils in the guideway walls is constantly alternating to change the polarity of the magnetized coils.
sentences.chinese: 供給導軌槽內線圈的電流交互變化着電磁線圈的極性。

sentences.english: High precision linear guiding pair ensured steady and long-term processing accuracy.
sentences.chinese: 高精度直線軸承導軌副，可長期保持精度。

sentences.english: Both screw rod and guide rail apply centralized time and rationed thin oil lubrication.
sentences.chinese: 絲槓和導軌均採用集中定時定量稀油潤滑。

sentences.english: At the guides there is a possibility to apply a machine balance and to align the plant over the pedestals .
sentences.chinese: 在導軌上，可以使用機械平衡和調整在基座上的位置。

sentences.english: Now, we'd like to describe details for the installation of the Blum slides.
sentences.chinese: 現在我們給大家詳細講解一下百隆導軌的安裝。

sentences.english: Germany Hafele three mute rail or DTC rail.
sentences.chinese: 採用德國海福樂三節靜音導軌或DTC導軌。

sentences.english: Germany Hafele three mute rail or DTC rail.
sentences.chinese: 採用德國海福樂三節靜音導軌或DTC導軌。
